description:
11.152 lumakey
Turn certain luma values into transparency.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: lumakey

options.description: Set the luma which will be used as base for transparency. Default value is 0.
options.name: threshold

options.description: Set the range of luma values to be keyed out. Default value is 0.01.
options.name: tolerance

options.description: Set the range of softness. Default value is 0. Use this to control gradual transition from zero to full transparency.
options.name: softness
